title: Please put the kick in ranked.
body: 2nd time in row I had the same bloody person, and you guessed it 2nd time in a row they ruined my promo; trolling, feeding, verbally abusing team, calling sup mid then going else where causing confusion in the team. Please just give this to us so we can get rid of people like that

replies.body: Waiting a few minutes before queuing up is hard.

just block the guy and send a support ticket, its the best you can do, riot gets this complaint a lot and its not really fixable but the best thing to do is that i said, block them so you don't play with them again and then you send a support ticket to try and get a penalty on he's account.

I blocked them from last game. I still got them. I don't want them again they keep screwing up my stuff, every 1 on our team and 2 people reported them this time and last time 6 people reported, but they still running around. I swear 1/10000000000000 reports actually get noticed
thats so true and maybe its cause we don't have a tribunal and all but seriously people like that need to just be shot

Blocking them doesn't stop you from getting matched lol. I have seen it more than once.

And I was wondering why that person never says anything rofl.
sorry that my method isn't right, no need to be a dick about it lel

The problem with that would be if someone wanted to play an off meta pick and play idk lets say poppy jungle and he got kicked just because the other 4 dont want him on their team. Maybe not a kick button but being able to report someone in champ select. Dodging is always the best option, even if it is in your promo you don't lose mmr for dodging.

Yeah even after you block someone you can still get matched with them.

Not seeing their chat does not stop them from feeding.
